item.title: ER Report for November
item.dc:creator: Joan Jimenez

[Introduction]

This comprehensive report examines emergency department (ER) operations, focusing on critical key performance indicators (KPIs) that reflect the efficiency and effectiveness of patient care from triage to treatment.It analyzes patient visit metrics to measure overall demand and examines the time from door to doctor, providing insights into initial response times. The report also looks into the duration from doctor to decision, highlighting the speed at which healthcare providers can evaluate and decide on necessary interventions.

Patients Visits Trend

Analyze patterns in patient visits over time to identify peak hours, seasonal variations, and the overall demand for emergency services.

Key Metrics:

  • Total Patient Visits
  • Average Patients Visits
  • Peak Hour
  • Non-Urgent and Urgent Visits

Patients Visits Workflows

item.title: ER Report for October
item.dc:creator: Joan Jimenez
item.description:
In sodales est nec lacus pulvinar congue. Curabitur tortor mauris, pharetra ac consequat sit amet, blandit aliquet ex. Aenean vehicula dolor ac varius ultricies.

Key Metrics Summary - November 2024

  • Total Patients Visits: 4,138 (57% decrease from October)

  • Busiest Day: Saturday (647 Patients) Peak at 12 AM

  • Peak Visit Hours: 5PM (248 Patients)

  • Highest Patient Volume: November 6, with 236 Patients Visits.

  • Average Door to Doctor: 14 Minutes

  • Average Doctor to Decision: 30 Minutes

  • Door To Disposition: 99%

  • Non-Urgent:44%

  • LAMA & DAMA: 1.43%

  • Mortality Rate: 0.02% (1 Deceased Patients)

Key Metrics Summary - November 2024

  • Total Patients Visits: 4,138 (57% decrease from October)
  • Busiest Day: Saturday (647 Patients) Peak at 12 AM
  • Peak Visit Hours: 5PM (248 Patients)
  • Highest Patient Volume: November 6, with 236 Patients Visits.
  • Average Door to Doctor: 14 Minutes
  • Average Doctor to Decision: 30 Minutes
  • Door To Disposition: 99%
  • Non-Urgent:44%
  • LAMA & DAMA: 1.43%
